resources.string: It seems that you are not connected to internet! 🤳
You\'re not allowed to access what you\'ve requested! ⛔️
Something unexpected just happened during the connection with our servers 🧐
This is embarrassing. I was unable to found what you have requested 😞

Filmatic shows you the popular movies of the moment. This is a playground application, developed to play with modularization, dependency injection and to catch up with modern Android development. For an overview of the project structure and architecture, give a look at the README on GitHub.
